title: One Piece Episode #627 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A detailed review of episode 627, discussing Breed's use of his Peto-Peto power against Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper. The review notes the episode has moments of humor but plays things seriously overall, creating empathy for the Dugong character, and was considered 'quite a good episode' that raised hopes for the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the Caesar Retrieval Arc episodes 626-628

title: 626-628: Caesar Goes Missing. The Pirate Alliance Makes A Sortie!, Luffy Dies At Sea? The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart! and A Major Turnaround! Luffy's Angry Iron Fist Strikes!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post covering the entire Caesar Retrieval Arc (episodes 626-628), written from the perspective of someone watching One Piece for the first time. Discusses the Kung-Fu Dugong's return, Breed's abilities, and the resolution of the arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers all three episodes of the Caesar Retrieval Arc
